body:
Recently I have been getting more serious with CS than ever before and I would love to get some Avicus 10 mans going down.
You can participate of any rank - the higher the better.

Mandatory:
EU -  sorry other folks
Teamspeak
Faceit account - I can help you set this up, it's simplicity itself
Don't come to fuck about

For any questions you can add me on skype :  b.banno321 
I look forward to playing with you guys :)

replies.body: Only because you'll be lagging around so badly that you'll be dead weight to your team and it will be no fun for yourself.
